name: Bryan: LD34
description:
Bryan was sleeping, sleeping so well that he started dreaming about a world, but not a normal world, a wonderful beautiful powerful world full with adventures,
enemies and his cute little bear, enjoy this adventure with Brian and we sorry for bugs, we wanted to do a lot more but we couldn't. This is our first oficial big
game jam together and we designed a way too big a scope for our game. In the end
we didn't have time to finish it like we wanted. :c We hope you still enjoy!

INSTRUCTIONS :
WASD : Move
Mouse Aim.
Right Click : Shoot.
F : Eat Candy.
B : Buy from shop.

Enter wardrobes to progress.
